nfl

Operations for NFL.

Methods

(async, static) getBoxScore(id)

Source:
  • nfl.service.js, line 51

Gets the NFL game box score data for a specified game.

Example
const result = await sdv.nfl.getBoxScore(401220403);
Parameters:
Name Type Description
id number

Game id.
Returns:

json

(async, static) getSchedule(year, month, day)

Source:
  • nfl.service.js, line 152

Gets the NFL schedule data for a specified date if available.

Example
const result = await sdv.nfl.getSchedule(
year = 2019, month = 11, day = 17
)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
year *

Year (YYYY)
month *

Month (MM)
day *

Day (DD)
Returns:

json

(async, static) getStandings(year, group)

Source:
  • nfl.service.js, line 203

Gets the team standings for the NFL.

Example
get NFL standings
const yr = 2016;
const result = await sdv.nfl.getStandings(year = yr);
Parameters:
Name Type Description
year number

Season
group number

acceptable group names: 'league','conference','division'
Returns:

json
